description.en: Deconstructive platform for exploring vector and latent spaces. Reveals how generative models construct meaning internally through attention maps, feature probing, concept algebra, and more.

context.en: Latent Lab provides tools for deconstructing generative model internals: attention cartography, feature probing, concept algebra, encoder fusion, and denoising archaeology.
context.de: Das Latent Lab bietet Werkzeuge zur Dekonstruktion generativer Modell-Interna: Attention Cartography, Feature Probing, Concept Algebra, Encoder Fusion und Denoising Archaeology.
